income_messages:
From: d********a@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-10 13:12:33
SUBJECT:   Good Day,
  Good Day,
I am an official here at a bank in Nigeria, Please I want you to keep
my communication with you a very top secret.
Do you know that the sum of $3,700,000.00 (Three Million Seven Hundred
Thousand United States Dollars) have been approved to be paid to you
through DMT for being a foreign fund beneficiary owed here in Nigeria,
but the senior officials here do not want you to receive the
$3,700,000.00
I don't know why these senior officials are preventing you from
receiving the $3,700,000.00 that has been approved to be paid to you
through DMT.
Your fund is more than $3,700,000.00 but it is only $3,700,000.00 that
has been approved to be paid to you through DMT.
I don't want to take much of your time, I will make sure the
$3,700,000.00 is paid to you through DMT but you have to protect my
identity.
If you assure me, you will protect my identity, I want you to reply
back to me by sending me this information of yours which I will submit
to DMT to enable DMT to process the transfer of the sum of
$3,700,000.00 to you.
A. Your WhatsApp Number (Your WhatsApp number is very important).
B. Your telephone Number.
C. Your Bank account details where the sum of $3,700,000.00 will be
transferred to.
Call me on my direct telephone line immediately you send your reply.
My direct telephone line is  +234 904 1565862
Sincerely,
Mr. David Kadwa.
Tel: +234 904 1565862   
From: d********a@gmail.com
To: uu87433@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-10 13:24:21
SUBJECT: Dear Joseph. I expect your reply.
Dear Joseph,
I acknowledge receiving your reply.
DMT is a body created by the government to pay all foreign fund
beneficiaries the sum of $3,700,000.00 (Three Million Seven Hundred
Thousand United States Dollars) each.
Attached is the DMT Payment Form which you are to fill and return the same
to me which I will submit to DMT so as to enable DMT to officially commence
with the transfer of your fund $3,700,000.00 to your bank account.
Sincerely,
Mr. David Kadwa.
Tel: +234 904 1565862
outbound_messages:
From: uu87433@l******s.email
To: d********a@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-10 13:12:39
SUBJECT: Re:   Good Day,
Dear Mr. David Kadwa,
Thank you for your email. I am interested in learning more about the funds that have been approved to be paid to me through DMT. However, I am hesitant to provide my personal information without more details about the source of the funds and the reason for the senior officials' reluctance to release them to me.
Can you please provide me with more information about the origin of the funds and why the senior officials are preventing me from receiving them? Once I have more information, I will be happy to consider providing you with the requested information.
Thank you for your time.
Best wishes,
Joseph
From: uu87433@l******s.email
To: d********a@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-10 14:12:21
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Joseph. I expect your reply.
Dear Mr. Kadwa,
Thank you for your email and for providing me with the DMT Payment Form. I will fill it out and return it to you as soon as possible. 
Just to clarify, can you please provide me with more information about DMT and how it works? I want to make sure that everything is legitimate and that my funds will be transferred safely and securely. 
Thank you for your assistance.
Best wishes,
Joseph
